summary: Recovering alcoholic, ex-LAPD, private detective Fritz Brown, is hired by caddie "Fat Dog" to follow his kid sister, who is holed up with an old sugar daddy. The trail leads to his old police boss Cathcart, and the bodies start to pile up.
cast: Michael Rooker|Big Daddy Wayne|Jack Wallace|Will Sasso|Selma Blair|Harold Gould|Brion James|Kevin Corrigan|Ron Barker|William Newman|David Labiosa|Al Rodrigo|Lisa Koch|Barry Newman|Lee Weaver|Kevin Jackson|Brad Dourif|Tobin Bell|Jack Conley|Rolando Molina|Danny Mora|Jennifer Coolidge|John Prosky|Valerie Perrine|Christopher Meloni|Alexx Thompson
